description:
Turn your multiline input into perfect chat input.

Monitor input field and instantly detect value changes in real-time, captures files pasted or dropped into the input field or another element. 

When a file is pasted or dropped, its Base64 string and MIME type are automatically published, enabling easy handling of file data in workflows.

List categorized emojis.


Base Plugin: 1T - Input Watcher:  https://bubble.io/plugin/1t---input-watcher-1646064999757x815455456760954900

demo: https://input-watcher.bubbleapps.io/version-test?debug_mode=true

demo editor: https://bubble.io/page?id=input-watcher&test_plugin=1729943734560x114402064874340350_current&tab=tabs-1&name=index
name: Instant input + Uploader base64 + Emojis
